short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor feedback and reviews of your extensions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When people leave reviews, comments or suggestions, the Chrome Store provides no notifications. 

This extension allows you to monitor your store page and notifies you of any changes. Currently it monitors:
- New reviews
- New support requests
- Change in number of users
- Change in rating
- Change in number of ratings
- Change in the extension version

v 1.0.1
- Fixed issue with retrieving data from Chrome Store

v 1.0.2
- Fixed invalid url
